description: Standardized output structure required for all systems reporting readiness status to the GCIM Gate Monitor, ensuring compliance with required_status checks.

status.description: The current readiness state of the specific subsystem, matching gate configuration requirements.

gate_id.description: Must match the gate_id requested (e.g., S2) for confirmation.

metrics.description: Operational metrics supporting the status (e.g., service latency, data age).

evidence_link.description: Link to detailed logs or evidence required for CRITICAL gate verification.
